account.descriptionLink:
The popularity of OreSupply and $ORE has caused excessive spam to the network layer of Solana.

Because of ORE's popularity, network changes will be hotpatched into the 1.18 release on ~April 15th.

In the meantime, we should try to experiment with what happens if we were to pause minting for 24 hours.

This would be at worst a one-of-a-kind social experiment, and at best that plus permitting the network to have a 24-hour breather.
account.name: Pause minting for 24 hours
